data.description: Beautifully updated home in sought after NORTH HARBOR Subdivision. Upon entering you will find that the home has been completely updated from the top to the bottom. The open floorplan allows light to flow from the front of the house to the back. Hardwoods are on the main level and the upper level, while tile, LVP and carpet are in the finished basement. The kitchen boasts a professional 36" gas range, two refrigerators, cabinets galore and a 10-foot island which is wonderful for entertaining. The kitchen cabinets feature, roll out drawers, a spice rack, a lazy-Susan and soft close doors. There is a bedroom on the main with an adjacent full bath. The primary bedroom features a walk-in closet with lots of storage. The primary bathroom was renovated in 2020 to include a 7-foot soaking tub, a separate steam shower, and double vanity. A new roof and driveway were installed in 2018, Gutter guards, A new hot water heater was installed March 2024, Hardi-Plank siding 09/2023, New Exterior Paint 10/2023, Zoned HVAC 2012. New Windows throughout 2012, New Attic Insulation (2018), and a B-Dry Blue Canyon Health Home System 2012 which includes a sump pump. The garage has 240-volt outlet and is wired for an electric vehicle. The garage includes a large storage closet and pull-down attic stairs which lead to a huge attic for storage. The home is located in a great location close to Sandy Springs City Center, Abernathy Greenway, the Chattahoochee River, White Columns trail, Shopping and Dinig, and super easy access to 400/285. The NHNA provides several amenities, swim/tennis/pickleball/swim team, a greenspace, a clubhouse, fishing pond and let's not leave out the wonderful neighbors.  The home is also located in the sought after Heards Ferry School District.
